channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Vance arrives in India, to hold talks with Modi under U.S. tariffs shadow
item.description: U.S. Vice President JD Vance began a four-day visit to India and will hold talks with Prime Minister Narendra Modi, as New Delhi rushes to avoid steep...

item.title: Stocks extend early losses as Trump slams Fed's Powell again
Dow set for 300-point loss,S&P 500, Nasdaq seen lower after three-day break
'A man of the people': World leaders react to the death of Pope Francis
item.description: Tributes and condolences poured in from around the world following news of the death of Pope Francis, who died on Monday at the age of 88.

item.title: Why one economist is assigning a 90% chance to a recession
Trump ramps up attacks on Powell, demands 'loser' Fed chair lower rates 'NOW'
item.description: President Donald Trump ratcheted up his pressure campaign on Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell.

item.title: Bitcoin sees biggest rally since 'liberation day' as U.S. dollar sinks
Overly bearish investors risk writing off 2025 too soon

item.title: Trump draft executive order would make sweeping changes to the U.S. State Department
